messages.title: A LOCAL, POSITIVE & CREDIBLE CHOICE FOR BOSWORTH
messages.content: I live in Hinckley, where I grew up and spent most of my life. It would be an honour to represent our community in parliament as your voice, creating jobs and opportunities for the many

keyPolicies.policyTitle: An end to the Brexit chaos
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will put the final decision in your hands with a public vote on a new Brexit deal.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Better NHS services for Hinckley & Bosworth
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will lead the fight in Parliament for better NHS services locally and make the case for a walk-in centre at Hinckley. I will campaign against plans to sell off land at Leicester General Hospital, remove all privatisation from the NHS on day one, introduce free prescriptions for all and scrap NHS parking charges.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Tackle climate change via a green revolution
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will take the climate emergency seriously, ensuring all new homes are carbon neutral by 2022, also creating thousands of jobs in the area through the installation of energy saving measures such as loft insulation and double glazing, renewable energy and low carbon technologies.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The last general election result in Bosworth

issues.brexitEurope: Labour will put the final decision in your hands with a public vote on a new Brexit deal.
issues.environment: I will take the climate emergency seriously, ensuring all new homes are carbon neutral by 2022, also creating thousands of jobs in the area through the installation of energy saving measures such as loft insulation and double glazing, renewable energy and low carbon technologies.
issues.health: I will lead the fight in Parliament for better NHS services locally and make the case for a walk-in centre at Hinckley.

housing.content: ensuring all new homes are carbon neutral by 2022

leaflet.personalStatement: I live in Hinckley, where I grew up and spent most of my life. It would be an honour to represent our community in parliament as your voice, creating jobs and opportunities for the many

endorsements.endorsement: I have worked in the NHS since 1986. It's never felt as tough as it has over the past few years. We used to talk about winter pressures, now the winter pressures last all year. It's time for the Tories to go. It's just going to get worse. I'll be voting for Rick Middleton as a local person to represent us in Parliament. Labour have always been the party for the NHS.

images.caption: Rick Middleton, Labour candidate for Bosworth
